extendedInfo.description: #1 Rupee App for NRIs in USA, Canada, UK, Singapore, Australia, Hong Kong and UAEâ See & Compare Top 93 Dollar, Pound, Dirham, Euro to Indian Rupee Exchange Rates of Top Banks âDeals âCharts âFees âForex âContacts âNews âGold/Silver Chart âHistorical Rupee Exchange RatesâTop-93 different provider USD GBP EUR SGD AUD CAD AED HKD to INR rates.â NOW, ALWAYS GET YOUR INDIA BOUND MONEY TRANSFERS RIGHTRupya currently provides United States(USA) Dollar, Singapore Dollar, Hong Kong Dollar, Canadian Dollar, Australian Dollar, Great Britain Pound Sterling(UK), Dirham, Euro to Rupee remit rates - all in this one tiny app.Rupya currently shows the rates and details of Axis Bank, HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, Indian Bank, Remit2India, State Bank of India, Bank of Baroda, Bank of India, Indian Bank, IndusInd, Kotak Mahindra, Xoom(Locked-in) and ICICI(Locked-in) and many more banks.Many more features to interact and provide us your valuable feedback using polls and surveys.You would also get a feel of the trend on whether the Rupee is weakening or strengthening against the Dollar.You can also add your favorite amount and track the rates for your favorite banks.Features:1.  Easily track USD,GBP,EUR,SGD,CAD,AUD,AED,HKD to INR exchange rates for top financial institutions2.  Handy settings tab to change your source currency anytime3.  Forex Rate4.  Remitted Amount Calculator5.  Bank Information like phone/email contacts, fees, charges6.  Forex rate graphical trends and Bank historical rates7.  Gold/Silver rate trends8.  India BSE Sensex/Nifty trends9.  Interactive polls, surveys10. Offline Rates Browsing.11. No additional account creation needed.12. Your favorite amount - Your typical transfer amount.13. Track your favorite bank rates amongst indicative and locked-in rates.14. Max rate Indication - Golden Star15. Trending colors - green for going up, red for going down.16. Free for AndroidPS: Paid Ad-Free & lifelong features version also available.Slideshare: http://www.slideshare.net/crazynova/rupya-iphoneandriod-appFollow us on twitter:https://twitter.com/#!/_crazynovaâââThank you all!Rupya is now the #1 Dollar Pound Euro to Rupee exchange rates app across Android and iPhone with graphs, contacts and much more!âââRequirements:Android 2.1 and upYou need Wifi or 3G connection to download the latest exchange rates from the respective banksâââ We value and appreciate your feedback, suggestions and reviews!âââ Before writing a bad review for us, please consider writing to us at feedback@crazynova.com, we will definitely try to address your concern.Disclaimer: Please refer: http://www.crazynova.com/android_disclaimer.htmlWebsite: http://www.remitmoney2india.comCourtesies:Graphs: http://www.exchangerates.org.ukNews : http://www.google.comÂ©CrazyNovawww.crazynova.com

reviews.title: Try this at work and home
reviews.comment: Highly recommended. No problems,no confusion, straight forward.
reviews.author: Shan Samuel

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Great App. Can the developers think of an Alert option???  Or is it asking for too much??? Maybe in the paid version. Alert should alert me if rate hits a threshold - so we can know when to do the transfer. I wouldn\'t mind paying for the \"paid\" app to get this feature.
reviews.author: Giri Vedha

reviews.title: Wrong exchange rates shown
reviews.comment: This app is not fetching the latest exchange rates from any of the banks websites. I was relying on this app to see if the exchange rate is going up but lately realised that it\'s not updating.
reviews.author: aneez sidhik

reviews.title: Unable to install
reviews.comment: The app is downloaded but the installation shows unsuccessful every time. Please fix it.
reviews.author: HIM SHIKHAR BISWAS

reviews.title: Not useful
reviews.comment: Filled with broken links n some useless info. I wonder how n why it got so high ratings when there r so many better apps then this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I use UAE exchange & thus app gives me correct updates
reviews.author: Vijay Patel

reviews.title: Comprehensive
reviews.comment: The top Forex app for NRI\'s. Well, almost. Includes Forex forecast among others. Does not include HDFC\'s \"NR Forex Rates\" (available on the bank\'s NRI page).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exellent app...
reviews.comment: Everything is perfect and much appreciated if it popups like msg when it reach certain max price..max price will be fixed by the user.

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy note..
reviews.comment: Hi Why is state bank ok india not on the list its sucking up now..upsettt    I love this app give a 5 star rating but I have been just wondering if you can set a notification for convertion rate so when ever rupee reach highest people can get a notification in this case this app will have every thing and will be used more and will be very highly recommended for people who send money or receive money on a regular basis. Thanks
